amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent the Environmental Protection Agency and the United States Fish and Wildlife Service from engaging in closed-door settlement agreements that ignore impacted States and counties.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 412 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 412 proposed by Senator Rounds. (consideration: CR S1769-1770; text: CR S1769) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent the Environmental Protection Agency and the United States Fish and Wildlife Service from engaging in closed-door settlement agreements that ignore impacted States and counties.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 412 proposed by Senator Rounds.
